      • addToCompress

        private static void addToCompress(org.apache.commons.compress.archivers.tar.TarArchiveOutputStream tarArchive,
                                  java.io.File file,
                                  java.lang.String sourceFileDirectory)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Adds the given file to the TarArchiveOutputStream .tar archive. If the given file is a directory, adds all the elements in it.
        Parameters:
        tarArchive - the .tar destination archive
        file - to add to the archive
        sourceFileDirectory - of the given file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if unable to reach the given file, or the .tar archive
